name: Event Horizon (itch) (Timbooooooooo)
description:
A small puzzle game to bring death upon the world as we know it.

How To play:
Choose the Level in Main Menu, 
Try to hit all deathstars and the earthlike planet. 
The deatgstars are optional.
Black holes have Gravity, Worm holes Teleport you and you can bounce off of space stations.

LevelEditor:
-Click and Drag objects on the left to add more of them to the scene.
-Click and Drag an Object on the Playfield, to move it around.
-Right Click Object to open context menu, for special config like rotation, scale or mass, or to delete it.
-Do not delete the earthlike planet, the comet or the deathstars, as they are necessary for each level.

-Enter a Name and hit Save or Load to save or load a level into the editor.
-Your created Levels will show up in the main menu

The Original submission was corrupted by a weird bug in Unity. I have left it in anyways. Have fun trying to find the Reason.
By Atraos and Timb9o.
Music:
"Ever Mindful" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
